      • checkConnectedGraph

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> checkConnectedGraph(Country parent,
                                                                             java.util.Map<Country,java.util.List<Country>> mapCountry,
                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> visitedMap)
        method to check if map is connected graph or not
        Parameters:
        parent - starting node of the graph
        mapCountry - map of Country and neighboring Countries
        visitedMap - map of Country and visited value, 1 for visited and 0 if not visited
        Returns:
        true if graph is connected, otherwise false
